dict.acceptation: 中心，核心，精髓；果心，果核；[地质学]地核；[计] 磁心；
去（果）核，挖去…的果心；提取岩芯（样品）；

sent.orig: He has been a member of CORE since late 1999.
sent.trans: 他从1999年起就是争取种族平等大会(CORE)的成员。

sent.orig: You can install PP filter core, carbon filter core, softener filter core, UF filter core, etc.
sent.trans: 滤筒内可以选择安装PP精密滤芯、活性碳滤芯、软化滤芯、树脂滤芯、中空纤维滤芯等等。

sent.orig: The component of core competence includes core technique, core management and core marketing.
sent.trans: 煤炭业的核心竞争力可分解为核心技术能力、核心管理能力、核心市场能力。

sent.orig: The reason back of sand cores were related to core-making equipment, core materials and core-making process.
sent.trans: 砂芯脱壳的原因与制芯设备、制芯材料、制芯工艺有关。

sent.orig: Knowledge, acquisition of knowledge, core competitiveness, core technology and core products are logically related.
sent.trans: 知识、知识的获得、核心竞争力、核心技术、核心产品之间存在着逻辑关系。
